channel.title: omnistereo on Vision 2π
channel.description: Recent content in omnistereo on Vision 2π

item.title: Visual Odometry with a Single-Camera Stereo Omnidirectional System
item.description: An extension of the generalized unified model (GUM) originally applied to a single omnidirectional view.

item.title: GUMS: Generalized Unified Model for Stereo Omnidirectional Vision
item.description: An extension of the generalized unified model (GUM) originally applied to a single omnidirectional view.

item.title: Single-Camera Omnistereo Sensor for Quadrotor Micro Aerial Vehicles (MAVs)
item.description: A novel omnidirectional stereo sensor using a pair of hyperbolic mirrors and a single camera.
